article.title: Lockheed Receives Nearly $35 Million SBIRS Payload 3 Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corp., Sunnyvale, California, was awarded a $34.8 million contract modification, which will exercise the fourth option for Space Based Infrared Systems Highly Elliptical Earth Orbit Payload 3 launch and early on-orbit support.Â Space Based Infrared Systems Wing, Los Angeles Air Force Base, California, is the contracting activity.
